project_short_description: Python Boilerplate contains all the boilerplate you need to create a Python package.

__prompts__.project_short_description: A short description of your project
__prompts__.use_pytest: Do you want to use pytest?
__prompts__.use_black: Do you want to use Black for code formatting?
__prompts__.use_conda: Do you want to add configurations for Anaconda package management?
__prompts__.add_pyup_badge: Do you want to add a pyup.io badge? (not recommended)
__prompts__.make_docs: Do you want to generate documentation files
__prompts__.add_translations: Do you want to add translations?
__prompts__.command_line_interface: Which command-line interface do you want to use?
__prompts__.create_author_file: Do you want to create an AUTHORS.rst file?
__prompts__.open_source_license: Which open-source license do you want to use?
__prompts__.generated_with_cruft: Was this project generated with Cruft? (Add a '.cruft.json' file)
